summary: The Health Care Workforce Innovation Act of 2025 aims to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a Health Care Workforce Innovation Program. This program will provide grants and contracts to eligible entities like Federally qualified health centers to develop and implement innovative, community-driven approaches for education and training of allied health professionals. The program prioritizes projects in underserved communities and rural areas, focusing on expanding the healthcare workforce, with authorized appropriations for 2026-2028.
